page.title: 12SCHOOLS EVENTS STEVENAGE
page.content: The seven schools in this block arrange various fund-raising events such as Fetes,Jumble sales,Flea Markets and Car Boot sales. All of these events are ways that parents and teachers can increase the income of the schools so that facilities and materials can be improved for the children. At these sales some people pay about Â£5 to hire a table or space to park their car to sell toys, books, games or articles they have made or bought for resale. Sometimes schools have sponsored events when children learn spellings or tables or go on walks and families and friends give them a donation to give to their school. Other events such as concerts and sports days are organised for fun and entertainment.
